text: /IRISO
January 3, 2020
RE: California Proposition 65 Compliance Statement.
Dear Valued Customer,
California Proposition 65, officially known as the California Safe Drinking Water and Toxic Enforcement
Act of 1986, became law in November 1986. Proposition 65 requires businesses to provide warnings to
Californians (and others doing business in the State of California) about significant exposures to
chemicals that are known to cause cancer, birth defects or other reproductive harm. On August 31,
2016, the State of California Office of Environmental Health Hazard Assessment (OEHHA) adopted
certain amendments to Article 6, Clear and Reasonable Warnings for California Proposition 65 which
become effective on August 30, 2018. For more information on warnings, please visit official website:
www.P65Warnings.ca.gov.
There are several IRisO products that contain California Proposition 65 listed substances. However, to
the best of our knowledge based on information currently available, we believe that those products do
not expose its users to such chemicals through contact, intake or inhalation as long as they are used and
handled in accordance with purposes, usages and conditions designated in the normal or foreseeable
use intended. As such, these products are not required to have the California Proposition 65 warning
labels.
We will continue to carefully monitor California Proposition 65 and will communicate any material
changes to you, should our position change in the future. We hope that this addresses your concerns
relating to California Proposition 65.
Please free to contact us at info@irisoconnectors.com if additional information is needed..
IRISO USA, Inc: 34405 W 12 Mile Rd # 237, Farmington Hills, MI 48331 USA TEL: (248) 324-9780
***This info is based on our current level of knowledge and covers our finished products as supplied/produced.
by IRisO at the date of issue. IRisO makes no warranties, express or implies, and assumes no liability in
